Adaptive Inmune Response: A stronger response involving the adaptive immune system follows the initial activation, leading to a ‘cytokine storm. Immune Response Balance: Normally, the immune response resolves the infection, balancing pro- and anti- inflammatory processes, and generating immune memory.
